author: David Aaro
title: Hospitals in New York, Michigan play 'Don't Stop Believin' when coronavirus patients are discharged
description: Doctors and nurses at two hospitals in New York and Michigan are providing patients who recently overcame the coronavirus with an important musical message, "Don't Stop Believin."
content:
